title: DATS data standard schema
description: A format, reporting guideline, terminology. It is used to indicate whether the dataset conforms to a particular community norm or specification.

name.description: The name of the standard (e.g. FASTQ, CDISC STDM, ISO8601).

type.description: The nature of the information resource, ideally specified with a controlled vocabulary or ontology (.e.g model or format, vocabulary, reporting guideline).

licenses.description: The terms of use of the data standard.

version.description: A release point for the repository when applicable.
